meta.description: The semantic skeleton of the web. Structure, accessibility, and the DOM.

topics.title: Boilerplate
topics.desc: The required structure for a valid document.

topics.title: Text Elements
topics.desc: Hierarchy matters. H1 is for the main title only.

topics.title: Anchors (Links)
topics.desc: Navigation between pages or external resources.
topics.code: External Internal Jump to ID New Tab

topics.title: Media
topics.desc: Images and Figures. Alt text is mandatory for accessibility.

topics.title: Tables
topics.desc: For tabular data only, not layout.

topics.title: Input Types
topics.desc: Semantic input types trigger correct mobile keyboards.
topics.code:
<input type="text" placeholder="Name" />
<input type="email" required />
<input type="password" />
<input type="number" min="0" />
<input type="date" />

topics.title: Form Structure
topics.desc: Connecting labels to inputs is crucial.
topics.code:
<form action="/api/login" method="POST">
  <label for="user">Username</label>
  <input id="user" name="username" />
  
  <button type="submit">Login</button>
</form>

topics.title: Semantic Layout
topics.desc: Tags that describe their purpose to screen readers and bots.

topics.title: Meta Tags
topics.desc: Information for the browser and social media previews.
topics.code:
<meta name="description" content="Site summary..." />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<!-- Open Graph -->
<meta property="og:title" content="SyntaxForge" />
<meta property="og:image" content="/preview.jpg" />
